extendedInfo.description: Simple Workout Log is a free & simple tool to log and track your workouts! It is a workout tracker designed to require minimal user input so you can spend more time working out and less time entering your results.PRO Key is now available on Play Store!If you are looking for a fast, efficient workout tracker designed to work great for both weight lifting and cardio exercises, this is it! Simple Workout Log automatically logs the current date and time each time you start an exercise so you can compare your current exercise to the last time you completed it at just a glance so you can push to improve your results each workout.Past exercises may be searched for, viewed, edited, and deleted using the History function.Simple Workout Log was designed for the sole purpose of eliminating the need for paper workout journals in hopes of making life easier while at the gym.For more features, including graphing support, cloud backup, no ads, and much more, check out the PRO Key available on the Play Store!Thank you everyone for your constructive feedback! Your positive comments keep the FREE updates coming!

reviews.title: great app
reviews.comment: simple wokout log book...must include picture add ons too..now its like a small note book....anyway all gym going guys can try it...
reviews.author: Mabin Mohan

reviews.title: Finally got what I need
reviews.comment: This is a great app,for beginners & professional athletes as well,it saves a lot of time and effort, and papers !!, I liked so much the features of showing the last exercise done,and the timer, But I wish if you can add 2 new features  1- free notes to write overall comments of all the day,and plans for the next day,...etc 2- Enabling compound sets, especially for different body parts
reviews.author: Hossam El Sawy

reviews.title: This app sucks
reviews.comment: Why is it so hard to just let people choose from a list of exercises everyone does, enter weight, reps, and repeat the next time they workout? If that\'s what this app claims to do, it is buried in the crappy ui.
reviews.author: Neal Patel

reviews.title: Good App.....
reviews.comment: Let\'s you put in your own workout and keeps track of progress. Like the add a set button and place for notes as well......
reviews.author: Jared Hirschi

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Helps me keep track of weights and cardio. Love the add a set button. Wish I could figure out how to edit the name of an exercise. Otherwise, A+. Totally easy to use!
reviews.author: Melissa Newell

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: This is a simple app that lets u record what u need to how u need to. I love being able to type in the exercises myself instead of having to browse through a ton like most other apps make u do.
reviews.author: Patti Sanojca

reviews.title: Simply Perfect!
reviews.comment: This is by far the best program I have found. I have a fairly simple workout routine mainly using machines and not free weights. I do want to track the weights and seat settings of each machine. This program lets me define the exercises and make notes. I control the number of sets and I can recall the last set of each exercise. I also like the feature of being able to keep the screen on while working out without having to mess with device settings.  Great software!
reviews.author: Glen Villalobos

reviews.title: Perfect tracker
reviews.comment: I downloaded the top app first and it was NOT a normal persons workout tracker. Plus I don\'t need an app telling me how to work my muscle groups, I searched for a tracker not an instructor. This app is exactly what I needed. Thanks!
reviews.author: Christy Hicks

reviews.title: Nice and simply
reviews.comment: Can\'t believe how hard it is to find a workout log with a simple interface that let\'s me change the reps and weight in each set instead of being stuck with 8x80 for 3 sets. No clutter, love it, can finally ditch my notepad.
reviews.author: mike ross

reviews.title: Simple and effective
reviews.comment: This app is for people who already know what they ate doing and just need to log their workouts. It\'s not going to hold your hand and suggest things. It doors what it aims to do well. Reserved one star for possible visual improvements but I can\'t think of anything else it needs. Oh, not sure why I can\'t get the pro key in my region! Doesn\'t make any sense.
reviews.author: Nirudha Perera

reviews.comment: Decent app. Needs better flow path for entering excersizes and categories
reviews.author: Maurice Dumas

reviews.title: Great and simple
reviews.comment: Great job. Simple to use. It made my weight lost easier. I lost 40 pounds and this great app kept track of every single pound I lost!!!!! Thank you so much.
reviews.author: Rigoberto Lopez

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: Best workout logging app I\'ve tried. I\'d like the option to delete exercises though, I added one with a spelling mistake and can\'t remove it.

reviews.title: Excellent for a quick and easy thumb nail sketch of your workout.
reviews.comment: Easy access giving the ability to instantly record the different aspects of your exercise intensity. Four stars because the program seems somewhat clumsy when revising exercise data.
reviews.author: Robert Mcguire

reviews.title: Useful and easy to use
reviews.comment: I find a lot of the apps for keeping track of your workout way too complicated and this one is extremely simple. If you like fancy stuff and lots of details you probably won\'t like this
reviews.author: Astrid Madsen

reviews.title: Almost perfect
reviews.comment: Pretty much love this app, its the best in its category - completely customizable as far as my routine goes.. One thing I\'d like to see, is being able to email my workouts to myself. That would makes this a 5 star app.
reviews.author: David Bresnahan

reviews.title: Does the job - missing a star for not doing more
reviews.comment: Great for a workout log for simple sets. Some nice functionality (timer, repeat last set) but if you do more complex regimens (supersets/ circuits) it falls down. Also, you can\'t group sets of exercises (chest, legs, back etc). Overall a really good (free!) program.
reviews.author: O Asha

reviews.title: Great! Perfect for its purpose.
reviews.comment: It\'s great. I does everything it says, is straight forward and easy to use.  I would add: I was at home on the computer looking at a new work out routine. I had to write the excercises with sets and reps that were suggested somewhere else. It would be cool to have a feature within the app where you basically make a \"Workout Plan\".
reviews.author: Graham Fischer

reviews.comment: Very easy to use.  Let\'s you keep track of you training in a very simple log.  Some of the other ones are time consuming and tedious.  I have tried others and have come back to this one.
reviews.author: Kim Bergh

reviews.title: Simple and Adequate
reviews.comment: This is easy to use, and lives up to its name. It is adequate for the moderate \"iron pumper\". Just keep track of what you\'ve done do you can change it up a little each time.    Developer: one thing that would be helpful; a web based db that the app could sync to for editing.
reviews.author: Hud Griffith
